```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
library(gapminder)
library(tibble)
library (DT)
```

## Min Population
```{r}
names(gapminder)
population <- gapminder$pop
min(population)
```

## Max Population
```{r}
max(population)
```

## Range GDP per capita
```{r}
names(gapminder)
GDP <- gapminder$gdpPercap
range(GDP)
```

## To learn more, you can explore the table yourself here:
```{r, echo=FALSE}
datatable(as_tibble(gapminder))
```
